transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Hello.

Hello.

Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji Subhan sir kaise ho?
Customer: Badhiya hai ji.
Executive: Main Vishal baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Haan ji haan ji boliye ji. Kaise chal raha hai sir kaam vagaira?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Kaam vagaira kaise chal raha hai sir apna?
Customer: Bas chal hi raha hai.
Executive: Maine aapko call isliye ki thi sir aapka ek baar fir se ticket open hua hai kyuki kaafi din se na aapne lead koi bhi consume nahi kari thi. Jo last lead aapne.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan wo sahi hai mere thode college ke exam the na isliye.
Customer: Achcha college exam chal rahe the aapke wahi main soch raha kyuki us din to maine aapko kuch.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan last week par hai isliye thoda. Is cheez ka exam hai aapka kis kya padhai kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Main kar raha hu MBA.
Executive: MBA okay aur kis matlab kya wo hai aapke paas subject vagaira branches?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Marketing and sales hai ya finance hai? Marketing sales hai marketing sales.
Executive: To sir aap ek kaam kijiye kyuki aapka already ticket open hai na to application to aapke phone mein hogi na IndiaMART ki fir agar office nahi ja rahe to aap. Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Ji. To aap kuch jaise abhi main dekh raha hu ek lead padi hai aapke profile mein aap open kar sakte hain unko only kyuki sir ye ticket hai to humne ye close karna hi padega sir aapka. Ek do lead consume kara ke aapko. To main likh dunga isme ke aapka exam tha is wajah se aap matlab pick nahi kar pa rahe the lead vagaira.
Customer: Ek kaun si leads padi hai abhi?
Executive: Jaise abhi main dekhu agar aap recent mein jaoge. To 50 tan ki ek lead padi hai niche. 10 tan ki bhi hai 17 ghante pehle yellow fresh potato ki. 10 tan. Jo ki Pune Maharashtra se. Dekhiye ek baar aap recent mein jaake.
Customer: Recent mein.

Customer: 50 tan ki hai aur ye Nasik Maharashtra se hai.
Executive: Haan aur isse pehle iske alawa ek 50 tan ki niche kya hai wo puri mohan karke. Haan niche hai par wo kal ki lead hai. Uttar Pradesh Azamgarh Azamgarh Uttar Pradesh aur Lucknow Uttar Pradesh. Haan. Aur iske alawa aap catalog views mein jaake dekhiye ek baar. To inme se koi si aapne kari 10 tan ya 50 tan wali mein se consume. Contact buyer kar lo koi si pe ek.
Customer: 50 tan wali.
Executive: Jo si aapko isme sahi lage ya jo bhi lead aapko thik lag rahi hai aap usme consume kara lijiye.
Executive: Jyoti potato mein deal karte hain sir aap?
Customer: Kaunsa?
Executive: Jyoti potato. Nahi nahi Jyoti mein nahi kar rahe hum khali chipsona gate potatoes mein kar rahe hain. Jyoti. Ek kupri mohan. Nahi. Kupri mohan aata hai isme nahi aata. Aap se hota hai.
Customer: Achcha. Ek padi hai khali potato ke naam se. Lead to khair balki hi dikh rahi hai mujhe 1000 tan ki bhi dikh rahi hai ek. 10 tan ki bhi hai 25 tan ki bhi hai. to abhi koi nayi le bhai wo yuhi randomly likh dete hai tan abhi to. Haan haan wo main jaanta hu kuch customer hote hain jo galat likh dete hain jinhe knowledge nahi hoti. But sir baat wahi hai kahin na kahin hume unse connect to ek baar karna hi rehta hai kya matlab kya pata kis customer ko real mein jarurat ho sir aisa bhi to nahi ki sabko hum ignore kar sakte hain na. Aap catalog views mein jaake dekhiye ek baar. Catalog views dikh raha hai?

Executive: Ek ek customer ne aapka ek product dekha hai fresh lady rosetta potato. Hmm. Haan. Ye hai sir. 11th January Assam se Vasim Maharashtra se New Delhi India se matlab teen logo ne aapka ye product dekha hai sir. Inhe aap contact buyer kar lo. Ek bande ko to maine contact kara tha. Achcha kara tha inme se kaunse wale ko kara tha?
Customer: UP se tha.
Executive: Delhi wale ko? Delhi se ya UP se tha. UP wale ko thik hai. To fir kya discussion raha nahi kuch baat aayi uske samajh mein jab aapne ki? Nahi usko jaise ki wo to banda jo bol raha hai wo to kuch bhi nahi hai uske paas dukan bhi nahi hai kuch bhi nahi hai yuhi randomly kuch search kar raha tha. Sir test karna hai 11 November ko hua hoga na 11 November ko usne message bheja bheja tha aapko isi customer ki baat kar rahe hain na aap? Haan. Kannauj India se Kannauj.

Executive: Thik hai ab kal kal se to aap lead consume karenge na sir proper lead mein. Kannauj Uttar Pradesh se hai Kannauj. Ji? Haan ye Kannauj Uttar Pradesh se tha na wo. Haan haan haan isne directly message kiya tha aapko. Haan maine usse baat bhi ki thi. Hmm. To isne bola dukan vagaira dalenge aane wale time mein. Contact pata kar raha hai. dukan vagaira dalegi tabhi usko call kar to bhi. Hmm. Matlab wo lead consume nahi hui thi. Haan direct message. Thik hai sir aap abhi jab aapke office kab se join kar rahe hain aap dobara se sir? Kal se ya parso se? Join to hu lekin kaam nahi kar raha tha isliye wo thoda. Achcha to kaam kab se dobara se abhi start kar rahe hain kal se parso se kal se kal se kal se. Kal se thik hai. To kal se regular aap apna lead check karte rahiyega ek ek lead ya do do lead kam se kam din mein aap uthaiyega sir isme se hai na. Aur aapke paas wo jayega bhi WhatsApp pe feedback satisfied not satisfied ka please karke satisfied kar dijiyega thik hai koi aur issue ho to aap mujhse puch sakte hain abhi. Thik hai. Thik hai sir best of luck aapke exam ke liye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had college exams, could not consume leads.

- Ticket was opened due to no lead consumption.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for the call.

- Executive suggested consuming leads to close the ticket.

- Executive offered to note the reason for non-consumption.

- Executive guided to check catalog views and recent leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will start consuming leads from tomorrow.

- Customer will provide feedback on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, ticket, consumption, catalog, exams
